title: Sink Discusses President Trump's Latest Speech
itunes:title: Sink Discusses President Trump's Latest Speech
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo) \u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Justin Sink\u0010White House Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss Anthony Scaramucci being removed as White House Chief of Staff, and the latest Trump news.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
